title: build fail: binutils@2.33.1 on rhel8 - no makeinfo
body:
`binutils@2.33.1 %gcc@8.3.1` is failing using `spack@develop` (26-Aug-2020, 20d37afafa3be3f9b6c3388e22f813261d4c3fec) on `RHEL8` for `x86_64`

Looks like the dependency on `texinfo` (which provides `makeinfo`) extends to 2.33.1 as well as 2.34. The package.py makes this dependency explicit for 2.34. but not 2.33.1. The build proceeds without problem when `texinfo` is added as an explicit dependency for 2.33.1.

Concrete spec: [binutils-422ehg.yml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5130808/binutils-422ehg.yml.txt)
Build log: [binutils-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5130801/binutils-build-out.txt)
